Package controllers

Interface IController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Controller_AskServer, Controller_NearestNeighborApprox, Controller_Null, Controller_Tensorflow_ClassifyActionsPerTimestep
    public interface IController
    Interface for defining general QWOP controllers. Follows the typical state to action mapping. If an implementation of an IController wants to use a history of states or actions, it should store these locally itself.
    Author:
    matt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g, GameThreadSafe game, float runnerScaling, int xOffsetPixels, int yOffsetPixels)
      Optionally, if we want the controller to draw anything to see what it's doing.
      Action policy​(State state)
      Controller maps a current state to an action to take.

    • Method Detail

      • policy

        Action policy​(State state)
        Controller maps a current state to an action to take.
        Parameters:
        state - Current state.
        Returns:
        An action to take.

      • draw

        default void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g,
                  GameThreadSafe game,
                  float runnerScaling,
                  int xOffsetPixels,
                  int yOffsetPixels)
        Optionally, if we want the controller to draw anything to see what it's doing. Defaults to doing nothing if not overridden.
        Parameters:
        yOffsetPixels - Vertical pixel offset from scaled world coordinates.
        xOffsetPixels - Horizontal pixel offset from scaled world coordinates.
        runnerScaling - Scaling from world coordinates to window pixel coordinates.
